name: City Above, Stinks Below
description:
A simple demo of a game about perspective.

You move around the sewers trying to work your way through a maze of tunnels.

Fight creatures, and take back what is yours.

https://forms.gle/Z8ZnoddYiKGvpex5A

Please fill out the quick feedback form above, after playing, as this would help the further development of the game! :D
